title: Heavy Gear the animated series
description: Heavy Gear the animated series.  this is not my rip, i found this at other site.  from what i read the show differs greatly from the table top/pc games and focuses on pretty much just Heavy Gear tournament where the robots fight each other.  this show was made by Mainframe, the same studio that made Reboot and Beast Wars, so that might warrant a watch if you're fan of the studio.  please help seeding when you're done.
